channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- BIG-IP Advanced WAF & ASM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- BIG-IP Advanced WAF & ASM

item.title: CVE-2022-41836|2024-08-03T12:56:38.115Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20advanced%20waf%20%26%20asm
item.description: When an 'Attack Signature False Positive Mode' enabled security policy is configured on a virtual server, undisclosed requests can cause the bd process to terminate.

item.title: CVE-2022-41691|2024-08-03T12:49:43.498Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20advanced%20waf%20%26%20asm
item.description: When a BIG-IP Advanced WAF/ASM security policy is configured on a virtual server, undisclosed requests can cause the bd process to terminate.

item.title: CVE-2022-41617|2024-08-03T12:49:43.268Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20advanced%20waf%20%26%20asm
item.description: In versions 16.1.x before 16.1.3.1, 15.1.x before 15.1.6.1, 14.1.x before 14.1.5.1, and 13.1.x before 13.1.5.1, When the Advanced WAF / ASM module is provisioned, an authenticated remote code execution vulnerability exists in the BIG-IP iControl REST interface.
